isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 4000 SERIES GRILLE

svcsubproc.title: 4700 thru 4900 Model Standard Grille
svcsubproc.para: The standard grille for the 4000 Series is molded as a one-piece hood and grille assembly painted the same color ( Figure 65), the grille cannot be removed.

figure.caption: Figure 65. 4000 Series One-Piece Hood and Grille

svcsubproc.title: 4700 thru 4900 Model Stationary Grille - Remove
svcsubproc.para: The optional stationary grille for the 4000 Series is mounted to the front of the radiator and painted the same color as the hood; this grille can be removed from the grille mounting brackets at the radiator as follows.
Refer to Figure 66 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. PAN HEAD SCREW, LOCKWASHER AND FLAT WASHER (NO. 10)

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.
Remove 9 pan head screws, lockwashers and flat washers (Item 1), 3 each in the right, center and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2), securing the grille (Item 3) to the mounting brackets.
Remove the grille (Item 3) from the grille mounting brackets (Item 2).

svcsubproc.title: 4700 thru 4900 Model Stationary Grille - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 66 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: The hood should be in the closed position.
Position the grille (Item 3) on the grille mounting brackets (Item 2).
Install the 9 pan head screws, lockwashers and flat washers (Item 1), 3 each in the right, center and left grille mounting brackets (Item 2), securing the grille (Item 3) to the mounting brackets.
